description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5q6fs","text":"Protocol for the preparation of library positive controls (LPCs) in FluidX tubes using the Bravo NGS Workstation. LPCs are used as part of the library preparation workflow of the Ancient DNA Core Unit of the MPI-EVA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
document: {"blocks":[{"key":"b4913","text":"Note","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gvka","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3l3k","text":"LPCs consist of 0.1 pmol oligonucleotide CL104 in 30 µl EBT buffer in FluidX screw-cap tubes. This document describes the preparation of a complete tube rack containing 96 LPCs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e49ns","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"821ga","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nlsd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dn63n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3qvoh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj52a","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfu44","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8en3","text":"Bravo-B NGS workstation G5522A with 96-channel LT pipette head ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ek3aj","text":"FluidX rack barcode reader (e.g. Brooks Life Sciences, cat. no 20-4018) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p3b1","text":"Tube decapper (e.g. Aperio 8-Channel Semi- Automatic Screw Top tube rack decapper, Brooks Life Sciences, cat. no. 46-6502)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eik7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1qn3","text":"Protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ce5g9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5club","text":"1. In a 50 ml Falcon tube, combine 29 ml EBT with 1 ml 0.1 µM CL104. Mix properly. EBT buffer should be decontaminated using UV treatment. Instructions for UV-decontamination are provided in the Appendix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"baaej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b4cn","text":"2. Get a new FluidX rack and use the FluidX barcode reader to read the bottom barcodes of all tubes in the rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4mh9d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5q59","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6q15p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98g6v","text":"3. Switch on the Bravo system. Switch on light and ventilation (\"Betrieb\") inside the robot hood. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1qs7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"542av","text":"4. Log into the VWworks software using the administrator account (password \"a\"). Load the buffer transfer protocol under \"S:\\Bravo_protocols\\MPI-EVAN-homebrew\\forms\\Reagent_preparation\\BufferTransfer_to_FluidX_Tubes.VWForm\". ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66bm4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hf8c","text":"5. Select the proper settings in the form file:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f6p9","text":"\t•\tbuffer volume (30 µl)\u2028","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an9tl","text":"\t•\tplate type for buffer transfer (96 Ay Brooks_FluidX 1ml tubes)\u2028","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mel3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9numj","text":"6. Fill reservoir with approx. 30 - 50 ml oligo dilution and place it into the position in the Bravo deck indicated by the form file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5paf4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dn84","text":"7. Unpack 1 Bravo tip box and place it into the position in the Bravo Deck indicated by the form file. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21p7q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36bjt","text":"8. Open the FluidX screw-cab tubes in the sample rack with the decapper and keep the lids by placing them in a 96 lid holder. You can find this holder next to the decapper.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hrpp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2pfc","text":"9. Place the uncapped FluidX 96-tube rack into the position of the Bravo Deck indicated by the form file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf69e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7scud","text":"10. Start Run by clicking the \"Run\" Button  (30 µl of oligo dilution are now added to each tube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhmfa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2oniv","text":"11. After run has finished, close the FluidX tubes with the decapper. Use the lids from the lid holder. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4q88","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfehq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"82cqq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evdji","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6t0p7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e53n3","text":"12. Store LPCs at -20 °C until used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqb16","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5jcv","text":"Appendix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjkd8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5diif","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rss","text":" reservoir","Kisker","97813","-"],["Falcon tube 50 ml","Greiner Bio-one","210261","-"]],"guid":"8D2B5748E2984485958B1AD0043E11B8","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4nc6i","text":"* Decontamination of buffers should be performed as detailed in the documents in the Appendix.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"jci1","text":"† Order oligonucleotide CL104 at 0.2 µmol synthesis scale (Sigma/Merck, desalted). Dissolve in TE buffer at a concentration of 100 µM (see document in the Appendix for preparation of TE buffer). Prepare 0.1 µM working dilution in TET buffer (see document in the Appendix for preparation of TET buffer). Sequence: 5'-Pho-TCGTCGTTTGGTATGGCTTCATTCAGCTCCGGTTCCCAACGATCAAGGCGAGTTACATGA-Pho-3'","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{"A_1":[4,1],"A_4":[4,1]},"printData":[["Reagents","","",""],["EBT buffer","self","-","UV"],["0.1 µM oligonucleotide CL104 †","Sigma/Merck","-","-"],["Consumables","","",""],["FluidX screw-cap tubes in Fluidx 96-tube rack","Brooks Life Sciences","68-1003-11"," -"],["Bravo 96LT 250 µl, Sterile, Filtered Tips","Agilent","19477-022","-"],["HTS deep well reservoir","Kisker","97813","-"],["Falcon tube 50 ml","Greiner Bio-one","210261","-"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"8548s","text":"[Note] ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1dkco","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d6190","text":"Optional: Usually up to 4 racks of LPCs are prepared at once. In case you want to prepare more than 1 rack, get the number of new FluidX 96-tube racks you need, scan them with the FluidX barcode reader and label the racks according to the details described below. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9dnhk","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cee9e","text":"The protocol needs to be started independently for each FluidX rack. Take a fresh pipette tip box for each run. The oligo dilution will be re-used in all runs. Adapt the buffer volume accordingly. 30-50 ml are enough to prepare up to 4 racks of LPCs.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"1F29104FDC8611EEBFE00A58A9FEAC02"}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"cfd1v","text":"[Note] ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"32m14","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"srha","text":"Optional: Put a fresh tip box and a fresh FluidX tube rack into the Bravo Deck and start the protocol again if you want to prepare another rack of LPCs.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"374FA188DC8611EEBFE00A58A9FEAC02"}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":15,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"15n2c","text":"[Documentation]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dokub","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fhb2h","text":"Label the FluidX rack with tube content (Library Positive Controls), date and initials. If more than one rack is prepared also add \"rack x (consecutive number) of x (total amount of prepared racks)\", e.g. \"rack 3/4\".","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9q3f7","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2ofgc","text":"Save file with rack ID, tube content, date and
